name: Chromacore
description:
Chromacore is a 2D musical platformer set in a dark, black & white world that progressively becomes more colorful and happy through successful gameplay. Positive audiovisual feedback rewards players for successful gameplay, while negative feedback is non-existent.

Players collect "Notes" throughout the game that trigger slices of the background music, providing a way of interacting with parts of the music track (analogous to Guitar Hero). Positive audiovisual feedback rewards players for successful gameplay, while negative feedback is non-existent.

In addition to Chromacore's unique gameplay, the style is a collaboration of many talented artists and musicians giving it a great look, feel, and sound.
